channel.title: NPC Help [718]
channel.description: Hey guys, I am currently trying to make a shop for my 718 server but the issue I am currently having is that whenever you right click him and click "Trade", it doesn't do anything- but if you click "Talk" it opens the trade windows. Does anyone know how I can get these switched around? Thanks!

item.title: NPC Help [718]
item.dc:creator: @im4ever12c im4ever12c
item.description:
@im4ever12c wrote:

I found what you were talking about, what do I do with this though?

private final static int NPC_CLICK1_PACKET = 31; private final static int NPC_CLICK2_PACKET = 101; private final static int NPC_CLICK3_PACKET = 34;

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Help [718]
item.dc:creator: @im4ever12c im4ever12c
item.description:
@im4ever12c wrote:

The only thing I have is an NPChandler.java, would this contain it?

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Help [718]
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

Usually this stuff occurs in the NPCpackethandler. I dont know if thats the exact name in any source but look in your source and in the packethandler folder look for something with NPC or Interact in it, there it should contain the First Click Npc functions, and the Second Click Npc functions, and possibly 3rd and fourth.

Read full topic
